QuestData.Title: Tour the Trading Post
QuestData.Description:
<A flyer, carried by the wind, flaps into your hands.>
Fancy yourself a collector, trader, or adventurer?
We've travelled all over Azeroth collecting goods of the finest quality for someone exactly like you!
Visit our new location in the Stormwind Mage Quarter and browse all the latest goods!
--T&W Trading Post
<You squint to read the fine print.>
Be sure to present this flyer for some extra Trader's Tender!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Trader's Tender from the Collector's Cache, tour the Trading Post, then present this flyer to Tawny Seabraid.

Objectives.Objective: Collect Trader's Tender from the Collector's Cache
